alert.note: Alert for Marion (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 24 at 9:23PM CDT until June 25 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL PIKE COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL ILLINOIS...NORTHEASTERN RALLS...SOUTHEASTERN MARION AND NORTH CENTRAL PIKE COUNTIES IN NORTHEASTERN MISSOURI... At 922 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hannibal, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Hannibal around 930 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Ilasco, Saverton, Ashburn, and Hull. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
